6.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Aishah:The people used to pray (tarawih prayer) in the mosque during Ramadan severally. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) commanded me (to spread a mat). I spread a mat for him and he prayed upon it. The narrator then transmitted the same story. The Prophet (ﷺ) said: O People, praise be to Allah, I did not pass my night carelessly, nor did your position remain hidden from me

chapter.eng-name: Regarding Standing (In Voluntary Night Prayer) During The Month Of Ramadan
